name: Blobuild
description:
A game about building your community, constructions and rebuilding ruins and corrupted lakes.

The scope of the game was big so we couldn't get it all done on time...

 but I promise to update it after the jam!

Tip: Finish the game by sending the boxers to the Red Well

To make boxers click on the barracks

Controls:

WASD/mouse to move around  or just 

PLAY
